text: Tony McNulty (born 6 March 1957) is an English former professional footballer who played as a forward, active in the Netherlands in the 1980s. ==Career== Born in Liverpool, McNulty played for Veendam before moving to Twente in 1984. He then moved on to De Graafschap, and later played for Zwolle. He later became an agent. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:English footballers Category:SC Veendam players Category:FC Twente players Category:De Graafschap players Category:PEC Zwolle players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Association football forwards Category:English expatriate footballers Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands
title: Tony McNulty (footballer)
